While in this state. all of your mass is prehensile. durable. and capable of rapid regeneration from all but complete annihilation. Moreover. your strength in this form is enhanced to be capable of several dozen metric tons of crushing force. able to surround and crumple cars. or quite morbidly. the human body.

objects.title: Custom Type Yellow (Mag. 9)
objects.text: Create a Type Yellow ability which is thematically appropriate. follows the rules of Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of 9. like other abilities within Tier 2. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Colony Organism: (Mag. 11)
objects.text: Design a species no larger than any insect. whose features and physiology you may specify. You may produce these creatures at will. and control their activities with ease. seeing through their collective senses at all times. They may breed exponentially with time, and you may produce hundreds of thousands per second. You can get quite creative with this ability. if you choose: create a colony of flying locusts that devour flesh and chew through steel. or an invisible airborne virus that causes others to obey your commands. or extremophiles sent into the stars which colonize worlds. If you are ever harmed or otherwise damaged. your colony can sacrifice their bodies to fill your wounds. morphing into your own flesh and bone near-instantly.

objects.title: Adaptive Regenerator: (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You have a near instantaneous healing factor. and you can regenerate from a single living cell that remains. When you do regenerate. your body will make any and all adaptations necessary to make certain another attack of the same type is mitigated or stopped entirely. This may include shock absorption that rivals a military bunker. armored plating that could endure bombing runs. and much nrore. which will all grow only more expansive as you take more and more damage. Pain is now pleasing to you. with the knowledge that it will only make you more powerful. You may revert between your human form and the inevitable monster that follows such immense changes at will. both of which will possess your absurd regeneration.

objects.title: Herbalist (Mag. 11)
objects.text: You may create. destroy. and control plant life in any species that exists and any species you can devise. You are granted immense knowledge of all plant life on Earth and other worlds. so you know how truly far this ability may be extended. from creating monolithic woodlands to strangling your foes with constricting vines to melting their flesh with horrifying acids and deadly toxins. These plants may replace any lost flesh on your body through healing salves and cell replacements. You may take this ability to the most absurd and extreme limits. creating skyscraper-like sequoias that move like tendrils to destroy buildings. all the way to plants which subsist in deep space by sunlight alone.

objects.title: Omniorganism (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Your own form may dynamically take on the shape of any features and any species existing on this world and all others in our universe. and any you come to know of other than these. This includes any species which has ever existed. from the dinosaurs to the creatures of the cambrian sea to the first reproducing beings in the primordial soup. You may select what features you wish to acquire from all of these. combining the jaws of a megalodon with the running speeds of a cheetah or the immense body of a blue whale. Any damages you suffer in one form may be shunted off by taking up a new one. ad infinitum.

objects.title: Kaiju: (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Design a titanic monstrous form for yourself. which you may shift into at will. This form may be between 50 and 100 meters tall. and can incorporate nearly any imaginable biological features. such as claws. multiple eyes. defensive spikes or shells, and more. This form is extremely durable. and becomes exponentially more durable as you reach closer to the center of it. This form is capable of regeneration. but only does so while you are not in Kaiju form.

objects.title: Custom Type Yellow (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Create a Type Yellow ability which is thematically appropriate. follows the rules of Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of 12. like other abilities within Tier 2. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Eden: (Mag. 17)
objects.text: You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Yellow, and you are a nearly unlimited biokinetic god. You may adjust genes. biochemicals. and cellular or noncellular life with immense precision and impossible scale. The amount of biomass you can shape into any Iifeform you can imagine. from eukaryotes to Godzilla-esque monstrosities. is without limit. and you can shape yourself in the same way. You could populate your surroundings with such biodiversity in mere minutes as to turn them into a veritable garden of eden or a screaming hellscape of terrifying monsters. All life created by these powers is directly linked to you. and under your control from individual cells to complex consciousnesses. So long as a single cell of life from your own body or which is created by you remains alive. you may fully regenerate from it nigh-instantly. as may any of your creations. You have an encyclopedic knowledge of all facets of biology. allowing you to take these powers to their utmost limits. While you do not possess infinite range with these powers. you can manipulate all life within a massive radius around any cell or life which you create. meaning that exponential propagation can spread your sphere of influence across the entire planet or even the far reaches of space. With ingenuity. you could propel pockets of life into the stars and colonize billions of worlds remotely. turn the entire planet into a lush. fruitful paradise. raze it to the ground with an army of horrifying kaiju. or surround yourself with armies of genetically perfected humanoids that do your every whim.

objects.title: Light: (Mag. 2)
objects.text: You can control light levels within the visible spectrum with ease, and cancel them to produce darkness similarly. You could make bursts of light like a flashbang to disorient enemies. or leave them in total darkness where there would otherwise be light. This ability may be a Primary, Secondary, or Tertiary Manipulation.

objects.title: Water (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You may control and move water within a reasonable volume threshold that will expand with practice. You may manipulate water in any form. be it vapor. ice. or liquid, but cannot create or destroy water for your purposes. This ability may be a Primary. Secondary. or Tertiary Manipulation.

objects.title: Earth: (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You may control and manipulate soil, sand, stone. clay. and so on within a reasonable volume threshold that will expand with practice. You cannot create or destroy earth for your purposes. This ability may be a Primary. Secondary. or Tertiary Manipulation.

objects.title: Fire: (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You may control and manipulate flames within a reasonable threshold of heat. intensity. and size that will expand with practice. You may create and snuff fire, or use existing fire for these manipulations. This ability may be a Primary, Secondary, or Tertiary Manipulation.

objects.title: Wind: (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You may control and manipulate air currents within a reasonable threshold of force that will expand with practice. This ability may be a Primary. Secondary, or Tertiary Manipulation.

objects.title: Custom Type Orange: (Mag. 4)
objects.text: Create a small Type Orange ability which is thematically appropriate. follows the rules of Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of 4. like other abilities within Tier 1. You may fill this slot with one custom power. This ability may be a Primary, Secondary. or Tertiary.

objects.id: Additional Secondary and Tertiary Manipulation Slot
objects.title: Additional Secondary and Tertiary Manipulation Slot
Metal: (Mag. 8)
objects.text: You can manipulate and control metals of any kind. using immense telekinetic force when altering their shape or propelling them through space. Similarly, you can create and destroy any metal of any kind. though you may only have a limited. reasonable volume of metal generated by these powers at any given time. This amount will expand with time and practice. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Synthetics: (Mag. 9)
objects.text: You can manipulate synthetic polymers, plastics. and a whole plethora of other man- made materials like epoxys. kevlar. nylon. rubber. and more. freely shaping their size and propelling them through space. You may create and destroy any of these as you see fit. though you may only have a limited. reasonable volume of polymer generated by these powers at any given time. This amount will expand with time and practice. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Weather: (Mag. 9)
objects.text: You can manipulate atmospheric. pressure. and temperature conditions in a region within what is possible on Earth's climate. The larger the overall effect you wish to create. the longer it will take to prepare; gusts of wind. thunder. and heavy rain might take no time at all, while abating or creating large tornados, hurricanes. or monsoons might take considerable preparation. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Crystal Lattices: (Mag. 7)
objects.text: You can manipulate nearly any crystalline substance known to man. including glass, salts. sands. and nearly all precious minerals. You may create and destroy any and all of these. creating up to a limited. reasonable volume generated by these powers at any given time. This amount will expand with time and practice. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Sound: (Mag. 9)
objects.text: You can manipulate sonar and vibrations to not only create nearly any sound you can imagine, but also to produce immense sonic booms and shatter materials by creating their resonant frequency. The sounds you can produce are sufficient to pop eardrums and move large objects. or produce shockwaves that crush cars. or vibrations that create earthquake—like tremors in any surface. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Custom Type Orange (Mag. 9)
objects.text: Create a Type Orange ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of 9, like other abilities within Tier 2. You may fill this slot with one custom power. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.id: Additional Primary, Secondary and Tertiary Manipulation Slot
objects.title: Additional Primary, Secondary and Tertiary Manipulation Slot
Gravity: (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You can manipulate the gravitational force to absurd scales. including to increase and decrease it in your proximity or on an individual. to control the gravitational forces exerted by any two masses to force them together or apart. to levitate with ease. and even to warp space itself to a certain degree of extremity. You may do so at a mind-boggling proficiency and scale sufficient to level massive structures or minutely adjust attractions between individual particles. if ever necessary. This ability must be your primary manipulation.

objects.title: Radiation: (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You can manipulate the strong and weak forces which arbitrate chemical and nuclear reactions with a certain scale. and may also use this ability to generate high-frequency waves such as ultraviolet radiation, X-rays and even small- scale gamma rays. Matter can crumble before your eyes, or you can force chemical bonds and separations between any materials available to you. creating deadly toxins or explosive reactions with ease. If radioactive isotopes are used. you could feasibly create devastating nuclear reactions. depending on the materials involved. This ability must be a Primary Manipulation.

objects.title: Electromagnetism: (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You have the power to control electrical and magnetic forces. from the minute voltages across computer transistors to currents which eclipse even the most powerful lightning on Earth. This may include polarizing objects to force even nonferrous materials to attract and repel, telekinetically moving any metals, razing entire buildings and city blocks with a single bolt of lightning, and manipulating every function of electronic devices. bit-by-bit and transistor-by-transistor. This ability must be a Primary Manipulation.

objects.title: Prima Materia: (Mag. 10)
objects.text: You can manipulate. create. and destroy a nearly indestructible Prima Materia whose appearance may resemble nearly any natural element. While you have a maximum amount of this material which may be generated at a time by this power, the total volume and mass you may produce is beyond what you would need to construct a skyscraper. and will only grow with time. This material can absorb the force of multiple sub-nuclear warheads without so much as a scratch. and can be fashioned by your powers into complex weaponry. sharp projectiles, protective barriers, armors, and more, limited only by your imagination. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Antimatter: (Mag. 11)
objects.text: You have the power to generate. manipulate, and destroy antimatter in small quantities. but whose destructive potential is immense, as well as control the scale of the reaction it produces. When antimatter comes into contact with matter. you may contain the immense energy released to simply annihilate matter itself, or allow the reaction to explode with immense force. creating massive subnuclear blasts that could level small cities. The more you restrain this reaction, the more antimatter you may generate at a time, and thus the more matter you may annihilate. If used to simply erase matter. you can atomically annihilate massive objects and structures with ease, including any opponent not deft enough to dodge your attack. lf allowed to react in full force. you may produce less than a decigram of antimatter. which. for perspective, is enough to make the world shudder. This ability must be a Primary Manipulation.

objects.title: Custom Type Orange (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Create a Type Orange ability which is thematically appropriate. follows the rules of Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of 12. like other abilities within Tier 3. You may fill this slot with one custom power. This ability may be a Primary or Secondary Manipulation.

objects.title: Mercury: (Mag. 17)
objects.text: You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Orange. and may control any single one of the four states of matter at a time: solids, liquids, gases, or plasmas. When controlling a state of matter, you may create and manipulate any matter in that state that you see fit, as well as annihilate any matter you create. You may switch between the state of matter you are controlling instantly and at will. so long as you aren't manipulating any matter in a different state when you switch. The conceivable applications of such an ability are quite literally endless. from generating immense constructs of your design, to creating habitable moons, to immolating your opponents within miniature suns. You could create huge pockets of hyperdense matter to generate miniaturized black holes, or feed iron into the center of suns to wipe out entire solar systems via supernova. Your consciousness is no longer dependent on matter to exist. and can inhabit any body you create for it using these abilities. If your physical body is destroyed. you could come to understand the body's every function and reform yourself with ease.  You must understand what you are creating in order to create it. While this ability comes with an encyclopedic knowledge of chemistry and physics. it does not grant enhanced creative processes or computational intelligence. It does, however, grant a feasibly infinite eidetic memory, meaning that you could learn everything that could ever be known about biochemistry. mechanics, circuits, and engineering, and construct complex machinery or new lifeforms with a wave of your hand.

rows.title: Principles Of Power Creation
rows.titleText: The creation of Aberrant Powers, unlike Types, offers you much more freedom for a somewhat higher or lower price, depending on your mutations. There are some very light limitations on how you may describe and create powers, to facilitate reasonable conflict and interesting narratives. (these power slots have nothing to do with Orange power slots)  1. Any application of a single power must naturally flow from its core theme and purpose. Optic beams do not naturally flow from superhuman strength, but they might naturally flow from the power to manipulate plasma. Flight does not naturally flow from fire manipulation, but it might flow from gravity manipulation. Applications of powers which do not flow naturally must be bought as a separate power or powers. 2. Any power which guarantees victory regardless of your foe’s abilities is neither valid nor interesting. This includes unlimited power copying, high-level death manipulation, unlimited power deletion, and so on. These powers aren’t in themselves uninteresting, but must have some kind of limiting condition: perhaps someone has to look into your eyes to activate these effects, or you require a touch to steal powers. As a general principle. if there is no possibility of an exciting conflict between two people who both have your powers, or between another person with abilities of similar Magnitude to the created power, or between yourself and multiple opponents with slightly weaker powers, they are invalid by this rule. If the results of engagements involving your power are uniformly determined by a static factor whose effectiveness does not change circumstantially, they are invalid by this rule (i.e, powers limited by arbitrary clauses. powers that work in a specific region of the world. at a certain time of day. and so on). 3. If your powers affect other powers, you can only affect powers lesser or equal to your power in question’s Magnitude. If your powers can dynamically alter your own or other’s capabilities in a feasibly permanent way, you and the affected individual's collective Magnitudes cannot exceed what they naturally do: that is, if you enhance others permanently, you must lose some portion of your power, and if you take from others permanently, you must gain some portion of their power. If you have abilities such as Power Copying, Stealing, or otherwise. these powers' Magnitudes will represent the maximum amount of power you may possess at a time via these abilities. Note that Magnitude is a logarithmic scale, and a power of one Magnitude is multiplicatively greater than one of the prior Magnitude.  4. If your powers can dynamically alter your own or others' capabilities in a strictly temporary way, the strength of alterations to your Magnitude must be inversely proportional with unmanipulated natural time: that is, the more you increase your powers or the more you dampen those of your foes, the more temporary these changes must be. These changes, since they are temporary, may exceed the Magnitude of the powers that granted them, with exponentially shorter durations the greater the enhancements or powers involved are. 5. The Magnitude of a Secondary Power cannot exceed that of a Primary Power, nor a Tertiary Power exceed that of a Secondary Power, and so on. This is designed such that your most powerful ability is also the one you paid the highest cost for, despite diminishing costs as you create more powers. 6. Causality is set in stone if the event in question has already happened. There is only one timeline. and retrocausal powers (time travel, etc.) cannot alter the present directly, since any action you take would have already happened. The future is not set in stone until it becomes the present, and precausal powers (precognition. etc.) can alter future events by changing the present. though they can only see into possible or likely futures, and not the set-in-stone antecausal future, since it could still change. Time travel into the future puts the user in possible futures and branching timelines rather than set-in-stone futures, where time travel to the past puts the user in the set-in—stone past. Powers develop independently of altered or dynamic time. meaning that you cannot train your abilities while time is stopped or slowed for infinite potential growth, even in natural conditions such as dilated time or alternate dimensions. Powers and the anomalies associated with them are tied to their state in the proceeding present. Alternative versions of yourself don't have different powers than you do.  7. The Magnitude of a created power must be in proper proportion with its functionality and scale. In general, abilities with a Magnitude of l are just above the limits of human faculty, while abilities with a Magnitude higher than 12 can create extreme and awe—inspiring feats among the highest in the setting. Pre—existing powers may be used as reference for appropriate scale. Magnitude is a logarithmic scale. For each degree of Magnitude, the anomaly at the core of a power's functionality emits a metawave multiplicatively greater than one of the preceding Magnitude, to say nothing of it's user’s prowess at using it, its strategic value, and so on. Magnitude is most certainly not the only deciding factor in an engagement between Supers, and creativity, situational advantage. strategy, and team composition all play an equal if not greater collective role than brute force of power. 8. Custom Aberrant powers cannot emulate the effects of Mutations which alter your powers, their growth, their protections, their potential, et cetera. The cost of a custom Aberrant power must be a whole number, unlike Mutations.

objects.title: Primary Custom Power: (-4 to -72)
objects.text: You may spend up to 72 points on a Primary Aberrant power, designing its effects and description as you require. This ability must be your most powerful non—Paragon Aberrant. and any sub—abilities you create must not exceed it, though they may equal it. The more points you spend on this power, the more powerful it will be. The Magnitude of this power is the number of points you’ve spent on it. Powers made in this way have a maximum Magnitude of 18.

objects.title: Secondary Custom Power: (-4 to -32)
objects.text: You may spend up to 32 points on a Secondary Aberrant power, designing its effects and description as you require. This ability must be your second most powerful ability, or at most equal in Magnitude to your Primary Power. Whatever permissible Magnitude you decide is appropriate for this ability, divide it by two. If you have the Set Architect mutation, instead divide it by 12 if you have Tier 1 or by 16 if you have Tier 2. In any case, round up to the nearest whole number. This result is its cost. Powers made in this way have a maximum Magnitude of 18.

objects.title: Tertiary Custom Power: (-4 to -24)
objects.text: You may spend up to 16 points on a Tertiary Aberrant power, designing its effects and description as you require. This ability must be your third most powerful ability, or at most equal in Magnitude to your Secondary Power. Whatever permissible Magnitude you decide is appropriate for this ability, divide it by three. If you have the Set Architect mutation, instead divide it by 16 if you have Tier 1 or by 20 if you have Tier 2. In any case, round up to the nearest whole number. This result is its cost. Powers made in this way have a maximum Magnitude of 18.

objects.title: Additional Custom Power: (-4 to -?)
objects.text: You may spend up to 9 points on a Secondary Aberrant power, designing its effects and description as you require. This ability must be your second most powerful ability, or at most equal in Magnitude to your Primary Power. Whatever permissible Magnitude you decide is appropriate for this ability, divide it by two. If you have the Set Architect mutation, instead divide it by 12 if you have Tier 1 or by 16 if you have Tier 2. In any case, round up to the nearest whole number. This result is its cost. Powers made in this way have a maximum Magnitude of 18.

objects.title: Custom Paragon Aberrant
objects.text: If a Magnitude of 18 is insufficient to describe your abilities, it may be necessary to create a Paragon Aberrant of your own, a power usually reserved only for the Morphic Entities. Beyond 18, the relative strength of powers becomes far more drastic as the logarithm describing their capabilities breaks down. Only a scarce handful of Paragon Aberrants exist, and fewer still are not already possessed by the Morphics.  Pay 108 points outright for a Paragon Aberrant of Magnitude 19.

objects.title: Augment Existing Power/Type: (-4 to -72)
objects.text: If a power, within a Type or otherwise, is not as powerful as you require it to be, you may augment its Magnitude with this option. Add the number of points you spend on this choice to the Magnitude of your chosen ability, with a maximum achievable Magnitude of 18. If you desire, you may augment its functions and capabilities so that it’s relative strength matches it’s Magnitude, and describe the changes you’ve made. Similarly, you may use this option to create new powers and add them to a Type, for consistency's sake. If you do so, the power you add will be Tierless within its Type, so you will not gain any additional powers in lower tiers for having it. This option may not be used to augment Paragon Aberrants. This option may be taken multiple times.

objects.title: Custom Paragon Aberrant: (Increase Magnitude)
objects.text: Each boost in Magnitude beyond this costs 12 points. For instance, a Paragon Aberrant of Magnitude 20 would cost 120 points, a Paragon Aberrant of Magnitude 21 would cost 132 points, and so on. The purchase of this power, unlike other Aberrants, does not decrease the cost of your next Aberrant power or any other Paragon Aberrants you purchase. It does not count as your Primary Aberrant , nor your Secondary Aberrant, nor any other of your typical Aberrant Powers, and cannot be taken in this way. This option may be taken multiple times.  Note that Paragon Aberrants break the usual scale of Magnitude. Where a power of Magnitude 18 may differ by a significant factor from a power of Magnitude 17, the difference between a power of Magnitude 19 and 20 is exponentially greater, with much more internal variance within a specific Magnitude. Paragon Aberrants are utterly immune to power manipulation of any kind, even if this manipulation might be beneficial, unless Hypermutation: Tier 4 applies. If so, Paragon Aberrants owned by the user may be manipulated, but not othen/vise.

objects.title: Aeon: (Mag. 19)
objects.text: You are fundamentally. causally. and anomalously incapable of death. and are unaffected by time, age. disease. physical or mental damage, or anything other type of interference. Your mind. body. spirit. and powers are truly and utterly immutable by any and all nreans, even those of unstoppable godlike cosmic forces incomprehensible to the human mind. On a causal level, you are prevented from entrapment for any unreasonable duration. Your physical body now represents the pinnacle of the human form in every respect. with intellect, pirysique, and beauty incomparable to any mortal. Your memory and mind are supernaturally perfected, meaning you will never be driven mad or senile by your infinite lifespan. If you ever desire. you may die of your own volition, and may return to life if you should ever see fit.  You can see any and all paths to victory: that is. you can see the adaptable steps you would need to take in order to achieve any possible goal. and you possess the human capacity to execute any of these steps perfectly, except anomalous or supernatural feats using powers that you don’t actually have, such as flying around the world without the power of flight. or lifting a car without the aid of superhuman strength, etc. Notably. if a goal is not possible for you to achieve with the abilities at your disposal, you will be unable to see a path to victory. This power can process hundreds of billions of possible futures in mere attoseconds based on the most minute of actions, and can calculate a comparable number of paths  to victory for you. allowing you to choose which path to victory creates a superior end scenario. rather than merely seeing the end goal to its completion. You may chain paths to victory together, such as a path which leads to the defeat of an enemy, and then subsequently the supposition of their resources for yourself. so that you do not create scenarios in which you are cornered by your own abilities. Even such eventualities as time travel or otherwise cannot disrupt this ability's prediction. lf desirable or necessary, your powers can direct your body on autopilot, so that the only error you can possibly make is what goal you choose to pursue with utter. ruthless perfection.

objects.title: Dynamist: (Mag. 19)
objects.text: When you acquire these powers, you may initially act with tirem as if they are any power of maximum Magnitude 18. From this point forward. your powers will dynamically alter themselves slowly to better suit challenges and weaknesses via drastic horizontal mutation. refining the initial ability you chose and gradually broadening its flexibility with each new challenge that arises. molding them like clay to better generalize based on your previous engagements. When your powers are impotent, your powers will shave off functionality in one sector to improve another or to develop new features over time. When you have time to let them grow, they will add new optimizations and sub—powers based on where they detect challenges to be most likely, or which have stumped you before. Whenever a situation that is challenging or impossible for your current powers to overcome arises, they will afterward shave off less-used features to bolster immediately useful ones or create entirely new features to suit the situation. if necessary. The result will depend on your combat style. personality. preferences. and situations that arise. This power stands to benefit the most by far from exponential growth enhanced by Hypermutation or similar sources, since its growth is perfectly modulated to create new features and increase scale where necessary rather than where used. With time. specific powers like durability will mold into far superior abilities like immutability. or turn strength into force manipulation. or turn flight into subspace transversal. This ability can pack on as many new features and powers. often completely unrelated to the  original. as necessary in order to create the perfect power that most optimally suits you. and will shift, ebb, and flow in accordance with your habits and fighting style. This dynamic power may not grow beyond a Magnitude of 18 in total power unless Hypermutation: Tier 4 applies. in which case this ability will slowly creep towards your personal perfect power with the years. never ceasing or questioning its final shape.

objects.title: Iconoclast (Mag. 20)
objects.text: When you come into contact with powers of any kind, you may create a version of them for yourself with the potential to grow far stronger under your cultivation, usually only one to three degrees of Magnitude lesser than the original initially. You can use any nunrber of these powers at a time. so long as their collective strength is less than that of this ability. which may grow over time (that is. feasibly several Magnitude 18 abilities. if you have them on hand. or a dozen of Magnitude 17, et cetera) This means that there is an incentive, for versatility's sake, to prevent certain powers from growing too strong. As such. you may decrease the power of any of these abilities whenever you see fit. Notably, none of the abilities created using this power may become Paragon Aberrants. and you cannot use this ability to obtain Paragon Aberrants unless Hypermutation: Tier 4 applies. In such a case. your existing powers may become Paragon Aberrants. but you cannot create copies of other people's Paragon Aberrants for yourself. So long as you do so only with a number of abilities whose collective strength is lesser than this one, you may distribute your powers to others and retrieve them back at will. When others use these abilities and you retrieve them. they grow and develop as if you yourself were using them, meaning that there is tremendous incentive to distribute a multiplicity of powers to others in order to cultivate them more rapidly than you could alone. This ability comes with a minor cognitive enhancement which gives you a preternatural and subconscious ability to decide and balance which powers from your arsenal you're using or distributing at a time. and can even do  so automatically and instantaneously if you do not manually direct them. The maximum total power you may wield at a time, and the rate of growth of your seeded powers, will also increase with time. This growth may be augmented with mutations.

objects.title: Polybius: (Mag. 20)
objects.text: You irave nearly any four Aberrant powers you desire at any given time. You have potentially centillions of versatile powers from which you may select. and this roster will improve exponentially with time, with new powers eventually forming in this set to suit your needs over time if a certain power does not already exist. You can shift between powers instantly and at will. If you cannot think of a power to achieve a goal, your powers will automatically offer you the best solution available from within the near-infinite number that could fill each slot, most if not all of which are absurdly powerful in their own right. Powers granted by this ability may include those Magnitude 18 and lower. depending on what is available for your purposes. Powers you use will improve as if they were truly yours. increasing the relative capability of powers you use frequently. and more steadily increasing those you've used even once. The number of powers you may access at a time will also slowly increment. albeit at a sluggish pace comparatively. This growth may be augmented by mutations. With extreme training. you may attain Paragon Aberrant powers through this ability and grow existing ones into Paragon Aberrants if Hypermutation: Tier 4 applies. but the pool of initial Paragon Aberrants accessible through this power is much more limited than your usual abilities.  This power comes with a significant cognitive enhancement which allows these powers to operate at their absolute maximum potential, as well as discern your intent before you could actually think of it. What this means is  that, if you do not consciously direct them. your powers will find and switch to an optimal set of abilities. often choosing powers optimal both in the present scenarios and for nigh—infinite calculated potential scenarios. If you would rather, your powers can also instantly switch any power with one you would have desired. all before your mind can even consider the decision. offloading the cognitive process completely. These changes may occur instantaneously. While only the most mind-bogglingly absurd scenarios could ever demand that you rapidly switch between powers, you're fully capable of doing so both at blinding speeds and to deadly effect. Moreover. whenever you switch to a new power. you are given a perfect understanding of its limits. capabilities, applications in near-infinite scenarios, and combination potential with other powers among the billions within your reach.

objects.title: Aether: (Mag. 20)
objects.text: You may possess any three Types of your choosing at once. and may shift between Types any time you choose. Your initial skill is sufficient to wield powers tip to and including Magnitude 18 within the three Types you are wielding at any given time. and this potential will only grow with time.Just as a regular Type user can. you may develop new powers within a Type so long as it fits the overall theme of that Type. Tire growth of your skill in your Types may be augmented with Mutations. Furthermore, you can seed and cultivate your own Types based on combinations of existing powers within Types you already possess. Genetic-specific Types may be acquired and used with this ability as soon as you come into contact with one who possesses that genetic—specific Type. While this ability does not give you the power to manage your abilities automatically. you can shift between Types instantaneously and at will. The number of Types you may possess at a time. and their relative strength. may grow over time.  While you cannot use the powers of others freely. you may seed them to use as material to create new custom Types by combining them with similar powers you come into contact with. You may givethe potential for a Type to any person whose Aberrant or Type ability might fit into a Type you've constructed. such as giving someone with a regeneration Aberrant your modified Type Red or Type Yellow. Any sufficiently cultivated Type you create with a solid number of Aberrants may be used and developed by you as well. In this way. you may acquire large clusters of similar powers  from others. given time to develop and a sufficient pattern in their powers to build a Type with.

objects.title: Morpheus: (Mag. 20)
objects.text: You are a true dynakinetic. meaning you can manipulate all fornrs of energy. be they kinetic, atomic. anomalous as used by Type Violets. electromagnetic. or otirerwise. This means that you can create irnnrense, mind-boggling telekinetic forces and exert those same forces as a form of super-strength, or endure those forces similarly by dampening them with this power. You could annul anomalous effects. such as the matter or energy created by the metawave of other superpowers. but not the power themself. You can feel the vibration of everything around you, even across dimensional barriers and time itself, and can tune your energy accordingly. The scale and variety of feats you can perform with this power is truly absurd, from annulling celestial forces to creating gamma ray bursts with effects radiating into the far reaches of the cosmos. You could feasibly create such energies as those released by the rending of stars or at the epicenter of black holes. if you so required. The versatility of this power encompasses a whole slew of possible applications. from superhuman strength to superliminal speed to telekinesis to radiation manipulation. One of its sole limitations is that energy created by this power cannot be converted into matter. but with how many feats are possible using this power. this is hardly an issue. Moreover, since the energy you create is limited only marginally in its expression scale and totally unlimited in energy supply, feats such as powering the entire planet subconsciously, collapsing planets and stars. terraforming worlds. and the like are all within the realm of possibility.

objects.title: Mobius: (Mag. 20)
objects.text: You are a high-level spacetime and dimension manipulator. Though the past may be concrete, the future is by no means determined. and you may enter any and all possible futures, or any time in the past. though as—per the law of causality past events cannot be altered. Just as easily, you may warp spacetime in order to traverse to any location in an instant. or slow. speed, and halt the progression of time, or alter the spatio-temporal dimensions of any object or person. careening them into the future or compressing them down to the volume of a penny. You can decrease or increase the distance between any two points without moving them. create fields in which time moves billions of times slower or faster, and whisk objects between dimensions as you please. from the fourth to the third to the negative n-th.You may, potentially, cut holes in dimensions so vast as to warp the laws of one in accordance with the other. or create your own empty pocket-dimensions for yourself, which you may occupy with objects you take from local realities and other futures. You can even interlink dimensions via your own dimensions to create a nexus of possible futures and far spaces. if you were so inclined. Nearly any manipulation of space and time on a finite scale is within your grasp. and the maximum finite scale with which you may operate will increase as your powers develop. Note that as time itself slows. so too will the development of your abilities. meaning that their growth is dependent upon true time. and not dilated time resulting from these abilities.

objects.title: Calypso: (Mag. 20)
objects.text: You are a high—level matter nranipulator. with the power to generate mass. alter the chemical and physical properties of existing matter. or wipe it from existence similarly. Because matter itself is beneath you. your consciousness exists on a level above material dependence. and you can create or destroy any form you desire. unaffected by damages to whatever physical form you choose. Your only limitation is the rate at which you can create and destroy. with nearly no scalar limit to lrow much matter you may generate or manipulate at a time. and these limits will diminish with time. You are given an inhuman knowledge of matter. chemical properties. and their interactions. allowing you to use these abilities to their fullest: terraforrn worlds, create new life itself, or create palaces and continents for your purposes. As your skill with these abilities grows. you may be able to create entire personal worlds, whose every quark you have placed and pruned like a careful gardener. or provide nigh—endless resources to the world. ending conflict itself, or brutally carve the world in your image. Even abstract forms of matter not yet discovered or understood by men. such as dark and strange matter, the stuff of neutron stars, anomalous elements, or otherwise may be manipulated with abandon. You would be surprised irow little man truly knows about matter, now that you know everything that could ever be known about it.

rows.title: Bloodlines
rows.titleText: When two people have a child. that child is. archetypically. a combination of their mother and father. While Morphic Entities do not reproduce. and simply come into existence when another dies. they are capable of cross-hatching the patterns of their spins, effectively sharing their powers with one another as a kind of horizontal genetic dispersal. Two Supers, or ones whose ancestors were Supers, have a chance to do much the same. This is how Types have come to exist, and how the world has remained largely stable in spite of the existence of superhuman powers: heroes, largely more tight-knit and organized than villains. monopolize the formation of superhuman bloodlines, eventually creating a status quo in which there are more heroes than villains. and in which heroes are generally more powerful than villains to boot. thus keeping the world in relative order. Villainous bloodlines exist. naturally, though they are far smaller in scale and typically more secretive. Most of these bloodlines are located in North America and eastern Europe. given that these regions created larger superhuman populations through inhumane experimentation into psychedelic substances. These are merely the most major and influential bloodlines in the Super community, and many others exist, though seldom span so many generations.  Being a member of these superhuman bloodlines, or simply being one blessed with some sort of chance pattern in your powers. you may acquire the benefits of four generations of arranged marriages. selective breeding, and downright abusive training undertaken by your forebears, all in the name of keeping the world safe from villains, monsters, and extradimensional threats.  Naturally, you may only choose one bloodline or power pattern within this section. The word “pure" within the context of Types and Aberrants means solely possessing said Type and possibly Aberrants or solely possessing Aberrants. That is, a “pure" Type Red has only Type Red powers and possibly Aberrants, a “pure" Aberrant has only Aberrants. and a “pure" Type Blue has only Type Blue powers and possibly Aberrants.

objects.title: Oath
objects.text: The Oath bloodline is a North American originating family characterized by their courage. their selflessness. and their endurance in the face of impossible odds. Some of their most notable descendants have proven to be some of and at times the greatest defenders of humanity the world has to offer. and that reputation has forced them into a position in which the west is largely dependent upon their power. forcing ever—increasingly amoral practices to ensure their offspring are absurdly powerful. Their line is characterized by durable Type Red abilities. often accompanied by an Aberrant for use at range. If you are a pure Type Red. have chosen "The Crimson Emperor" as your Egregore Patron and 'Born Super" as your origin, gain +4 point from the strength and valor imparted to you by your Oath blood. You may still possess Aberrant abilities.

objects.title: Romanov
objects.text: The Romanov bloodline originates in Novosibirsk. tempered by the Siberian tundra and progenated by the subjects of KGB experiments. They are characterized by their spartanlc standards of excellence. their dlsdaln towards weakness of character. and their dedication to the safety of the collective above all else. Members of their bloodline uniformly possess at least two Types, with one in particular almost always being superior to their other. often neglected Types. If you have the Polytype Mutation, have no Aberrant powers. have 'Born Super“ as your origin. and have powers In two or tnore Types. gain +4 point from the ruthless standards and unwavering excellence imparted by membership in the Romanov bloodline.

objects.title: Epona
objects.text: The Epona family originates in the British Isles. created during the hippie revolution of the late 20th century. Notably. their primary membership traces Its roots not to Psilocybin and LSD. but to Datur‘a and Beriadryi overdose. It is not surprising that Type Black was originally genetically exclusive to this family. They are excessively enduring to mental and physical trauma. with little to no regard for their own safety so long as their goals are met. Thus. only the best of them remain. and they certainly earn that distinction. Their family are all users of the Type Black domain. with renowned skill therein. If you are a pure Type Black. have chosen ‘The Ebony Prince' as your Egregore Patron and ‘Born Super“ as your origin. gain 4 point from the eccentric blood of your forefathers in the Epona family. You may still possess Aberrant abilities.

objects.title: Voss
objects.text: The noble House of Silence is one of the most mysterious and secretive families in the Super community. Its female members are celibate. nunlike psychic practitioners feeding endless streams of information to the mind of the House Matirarch at any given time. The male members are responsible for bringing suitable blood into the fold to continue this process. Neither good nor evil. their aims are beyond unenhanced minds. They are characterized by their cultlike behavior, their cold and emotionless demeanor. and their incredible telepathic abilities. If you are a pure Type Blue, have chosen "The Cobalt Monarch" as your Egregore patron, and have "Born Super' as your origin. gain +4 point from the insurmountable intellect and Machiavellian strategic genius imparted by your ties to the Voss bloodline. You may still possess Aberrant abilities.

objects.title: Tsukumo
objects.text: The isolated Tsukumo family have taken the selective marital practices typical of powered families to their utmost extremes. They bring into their fold only those whose powers differ vastly from any in their lineage. intentionally preventing the formation of a genetic- exclusive Type to the benefit of their famously powerful Aberrant abilities. Many of the mutations seen as universal among other groups are not found within this family, due to their adherence to selective purity. They are characterized by their unpredictability. their strict adherence to traditional Confuscian ethics. and their ability to adapt to nearly any circumstance. despite how specialized their abilities typically are. If you possess the Vanilla mutation and are a pure Aberrant (possess no Type powers), gain +4 points from the carefully selected powers of your parents, shaped over generations to produce the most magnificent Aberrants on Earth.

objects.title: Al-Fasil
objects.text: Tire superhuman ingenurty of Al-i’asrl's membership has made their family exceptionally wealthy. and brought advancements which have altered the course of history. Their advancements in medicine have all btrt removed terminal illness from the population. their passenger aircraft can soar around the world in less than two hours. and their weapons technology has enhanced rouge superhuman containment techniques tenfold. Tire majority of the profits from these industries are ptrt towards altruistic aims such as the elimination of hunger and provrsiorr for displaced peoples. With all that wealth. however. comes suspicion: their role in shaping world politics. especrally in Indra. eastern Europe. and the Middle East. rs undeniable. and one wonders what awaits the world evermore resting in their hands. If you are a ptrre Type Grey. have “Born Super“ as your origin. and have no Aberrant powers. gain +4 from your associations with the prestigious line of Al-Fasil

objects.title: Zora
objects.text: The Zora bloodline. much as the Romanovs. originate in KGB psychotronic experiments. their lineage rising in numerous Eastern Bloc nations such as Belarus. Serbia. and Latvia. Unlike the Rorrranovs. their name does not carry association with spartanic methods and ruthless training imparted during Cold-War efforts to defeat the west in the superhuman arms race. They are renowned worldwide for their incalculable speeds and their aid in expanding space exploration through their Type Violet abilities. Much of their family has since migrated across the world. and are now known for their strength of heart. their global reach. and their opposnion to many of the questionable practices of other superhuman bloodlines. such as arranged marriage and abusive training standards. which has brought intense rivalries with many of the highest- standing families in the world. such as the Oaths and Ronranovs. despite their shared objectives of protecting the innocent.  If you are a pure Type Violet, have “Born Super' as your origin. and irave no Aberrant power‘s. gain +4 from the blood of the Zoras flowing in your veins.

objects.title: Grimlore
objects.text: Celtic religious revivalism in the United Kingdom such as in the OBOD and the Church of the Universal 80nd have strongly contributed to the formation of the Crimlore family. functioning less as a bloodline and more as an occult collective which brings practitioners into their extended family over time. As a result. their generational library of sorceric knowledge is matched by few if any. honed over decades of study by the legendary Type Green users in their fold. They are characterized by their distance from Earthly matters. instead abating and protecting the world from threats beyond extradimensional veils. whose arrival could not be prevented by any but masters of the mystic such as they. If you are a pure Type Green. have “Born Super“. ‘Psychedelics' or 'Luctd Dream' as your origin. and have no Aberrant powers. gain +4 from the knowledge afforded by beneficiaries in the Grimlore bloodline. whether or not you yourself are of their same blood.

objects.title: Leon
objects.text: The Leon family's sparse membership is primarily located in Quebec. southern France. and Cajun/Creole regions of the United States. The Type Orange domain was. originally. a genetic-exclusive Type among its members, and to this day all of its direct descendants possess these abilities. Though their line is quite small in number. they have noble and lavish sensibilities and traditions. often precluding large estates and luxurious balls held for the Super community. At times. they seem more like a powered royal lineage of modern princes and barons than heroes or villains. If you have powers in the Type Orange domain. have “Born Super' as your origin.and have no Aberrant powers, gain +4 from your associations with the illustrious Leons.

objects.title: Evelock
objects.text: The Evelock family does not hold itself to the absurd standards of excellence set out by the Super community. nor are they easily compelled into petty squabbles as so often others are. They largely take after their progenitors. hippies. flower-children. and Iove-not-war types from the bygone age of the Vietnam draft. it is not surprising then that their powers follow in the Type Yellow domain. granting them the power to prevent ecological collapse and create new species to live in harmony with the human race. If you have powers in the Type Yellow domain. have "Born Super' as your origin. and have no Aberrant powers. gain +4 from your parentage in the Evelock family.

objects.title: Amon
objects.text: The Amon line is less concerned with the propagation of powers and more with the propagation of beneficial mutations. Since even the unpowered can have their benefits. the Anion line is a group of astrally beautiful nigh- immortals due to such mutations. only some of whom possess a varied array of seemingly random powerse. They are reclusive. archaic in their ways. and seldom make appearances. Though there's little pattern to the powers they possess. they are often Type Yellow. Type Green. and Type Black users. though never more than one at a time. If you have the Eternal, Airbrush. Noctis Cape. andi'or Grab Bag mutations. are a Mutaform. and have ~Born Super‘ as your origin. gain 4 point for the rare blood of the Amon line which grants you such inhuman traits.

objects.title: Crossbreed
objects.text: Statistically speaking. most people are related by a common ancestor at least ten generations in the past. A similar phenomenon. though much more rare. may affect people‘s potential for Type abilities and their expression. As such. genetic-exclusive Types. regardless of their origins. over multiple generations will eventually flow into the population at large. You may be such a case yourself. You may fit the pattern of a bloodline, but are not associated with the family itself. being a distant relative or undergoing a natural trigger which induces similar results. if you have not chosen 'Born Super' as your origin. and fit the described criteria for one or more bloodlines. gain +4 point from the distant relation you have with the original family. however weak or even nonexrstent your blood relations may be.

objects.title: Noble Singularity
objects.text: The most notable Aberrants in history are seldom if ever accompanied by supplementary powers. instead focusing on one overwhelmingly powerful ability over any other. The anomalies associated with such powers are often called Noble Singularities. and therr users have some of the highest variance in power on Earth. from the weakest of the weak to the strongest of the strong. and nothing in- between.  If you have only one power. and it is an Aberrant or Paragon Aberrant. and you have not chosen 'Born Super' as your origin. take +2 point from the perfected architecture and all-encompassing versatility of the Noble Singularity which fuels your abilities.

objects.title: Outworlder Union
objects.text: While most Earth non-natives are far less likely to develop powers than their Earth-originating counterparts. this statistic is turned on its head in the presence of a Symbiotic Patron: offworlders who have such beneficial alien symbiotes are actually more likely to develop powers. and better powers too. However. since Syrnbiolic Morphs are exceedingly rate. this fact does not significantly alter the composition of Super populations.  If you have chosen ‘Nonnative‘ as your species and have either the Fractal Morph. the Knight Morph. or the Biodependent Morph as a Symbiotic Patron. gain 4 for the enhanced benefits you received clue to your alien physiology.

objects.title: Independent
objects.text: Your powers come only from yourself. You make no concessions or pacts. take no boons of blood. and refuse to accept powers proffered by the labor of others. You are of yourself. and you will not stammer before the likes of archetypal gods in your defense. nor patriarchs and matrrarclts of long-standing houses who bred you into existence like livestock to bolster their lineage. You will not take what is made for you. or what others would make of you.  if you have only Aberrant or Paragon Aberrant powers. have chosen no Egregore or Symbiote Patron. do not have ‘Born Super" as your origin. and did not choose or replicate a Paragon Aberrant from the ’Paragon Aberrants' section (i.e. you created all of your powers yourself). gain +2 points for your pride. your willingness to take risks. and your visionary inadherence to the status quo. You've got the makings of a power creator yourself. you know.

objects.title: Your Lineage
objects.text: Depending on your age. you may not even have children. or may already have grandchildren or great-grandchildren. If you aren't a member of an established family of Supers. you should consider the prospects of your offspring. What powers you marry into. and what powers your children marry into. could shape the stability of the world. Included here are the rules governing how powers pass. and with them in mind. your lineage could be one of conquerors. saviors. and demigods.  When a powered and unpowered person have a child. that child does not have powers. The descendants of two powered persons. or a powered person and the descendant of a powered person. may have superhuman offspring. who take after their nearest powered ancestor. usually with some modification in the powers of their forebears. lf several ancestors had similar abilities in one aspect or another. the child has the potential to develop them all. though once they have developed their powers to a certain strength. it is exponentially more difficult to develop others their ancestors had. This means youth is the most optimal time to develop power versatility. while adulthood is the most optimal time to develop power strength. Higher Tiered mutations are considered dominant over lower Tiered mutations. and cart manifest even in unpowered offspring. Humans. Mutaforms. and Norrnatives who originate from alternate Earths may produce healthy offspring. with native human traits being considered dominant over nonnative traits.  This section allows you to select resources other than superhuman abilities and enhancements for them. such as bases of operation. extensive wealth. armies of henchmen. hired Supers. and supersuits. As such, it uses a completely separate type of points. being Resource Points (R.P). The Resource Points you have is dependent on your previously chosen Listing.

objects.title: Basic Material
objects.text: All things taken into consideration. carbon mesh. steel plating. and other basic suits are somewhat last—gen. They are reliably durable. easy to customize. lightweight. and generally serviceable for any Super’s practical needs. but lack many of the features modern high-end suits have. whether in their material complexity.  technological augmentations. or overabundance of utilities. This suit. without any custom cosmetic additions. can fulfill the classic superhero look decently well: it usually comes in the form of a custom—fitting bodysuit that hugs close to the skin to avoid air resistance or snags. Most classic superhero designs off the top of your head could be replicated with a mundane suit such as this one. and its durability makes it suitable for Iow-to-medium impact Super engagements. Because such designs were so ubiquitous among first-generation Supers. repairs have been perfected for this suit; you could tear it to strings and have it back in one- to—three business days. air-mail special from your suit provider. It should be assumed that other materials. unless otherwise specified. are somewhat more durable than basic industrial materials like these.

objects.title: Heavy Suit
objects.text: Most suits are designed to magnify performance and let Supers do things they wouldn't be able to in normal clothing. Maybe you want the opposite. to test how far you can go in every respect, weigh yourself down only to explode with incredible power when you let loose. or perhaps you're simply too powerful for your own good. In  any case. this suit is designed with your needs in mind. lts interior can simulate immense gravitational. electrical, and thermal conditions. with the ability to filter immense energy emissions, effectively crippling the user’s powers and subjectng them to absurd difficulty while wearing it. This suit's dampening and stress—simulation capabilities are truly absurd. but will never go beyond what the user can feasibly survive without permanent damage. from a simulation of small free weight attachments to bench pressing planets with every subtle movement. Similarly. it can limit the user’s consumption of oxygen. microdose toxins to develop immunities, selectively fracture bones to increase their durability, apply numbing agents to prevent shock. and so on. While it’s most obvious use is for utterly masochistic training, it can also be used to artificially dull down powers that are difficult to control.

objects.title: Nanovelour
objects.text: Nanovelour provides an extreme degree of feasible utility and customization to its wearer. with a somewhat involved learning curve. Nanovelour is composed of billions and billions of nanomachines per square inch. controlled by a micro-transceiver chipped into the user's skin. These nanomachines can perform an immense number  of tasks, though one major benefit of a nanovelour suit is that it requires no suit—up; the user simply presses a spot on their skin where they have chosen to place an implant. and the suit instantly covers its user. Since its component mesh is microscopic in scale. the suit can repair itself from nearly any damage in the blink of an eye. Moreover, the user can manually control the suit's movements, meaning practical concerns about capes and loose cloth are totally alleviated. lt's shock absorption, self—repair. aerodynamics, and end-user tailorability makes nanovelour a material suitable for the best of the best.

objects.title: Teslite Projection
objects.text: Teslite is a hard—light material generated from a remote projector. with immense durability. end—user programmability, and near instantaneous suit—up times. it's durability is comparable to the likes of Nanovelour. albeit with less design around shock absorption and more around flat  durability. At will, the user may activate or deactivate the entire suit or portions of it. after which this projection will take on mass. flexibility. shape, and design, perfectly mimicking the feeling and weight of normal suits. The suit's weight. material simulation. and design may all be customized by the user with a little programming know-how, making a Teslite suit endlessly alterable. repairable. modifiable. and replaceable without the aid of the suit's original manufacturers.

objects.title: Biothread
objects.text: A biothread colony is made up of billions of genetically modified extremophiles designed to adapt and aid their user. First and foremost. biothreads are designed to instantly close and flush wounds their user undertakes. detected via penetration of the suit itself. essentially providing instant first aid where necessary.  Secondly. their colony structure adapts as damage is taken. and rapidly evolves depending on the kinds of damage their user takes. If they are enduring intense heat, they will slowly but surely evolve to better resist this threat. If they are taking immense shock and blunt forces. they will evolve to anticipate and absorb shock. If they are continually being pierced, they will strengthen their binding agents to adapt accordingly. When not engaged in combat or out of sunlight. they enter a stasis to preserve themselves for billions of years, and photosynthesize minimally to remain alive and reproduce when damaged.

objects.title: Cybersuit
objects.text: Your suit is a cybernetic powerhouse of modern engineering. Designed to be used by anti-superhuman countermeasures. thrill seekers. and eccentric billionaires alike. this suit. while by far the bulkiest on the market. hosts a suite of features that reminds one how far engineering has truly come. It  sports a durable armored exterior, retractable helmet. internal shock absorbers. oxygen recirculation. and that only names a few features. Moreover, this suit is designed with modularity in mind, and as such, all Utilities purchased cost 1 R.P. instead of 2. and all Supertech purchased costs 2 R.P instead of 4. If you want to custom—design an enormous amount of utilities for your suit at a decreased overhead cost, the engineers will begin their work promptly.

objects.title: Metanon Silk
objects.text: Metanon is the modern—age standard for most fabric used in super suits. Number 12 on the Anomalous Periodic Table. metanon is a soft. dull metal that can be spun into tight. thin wires and threads. While it's not any more durable than normal cloth on its own, Metanon has one incredibly desirable property: it  can use and extend the effects of powers themselves unobstructedly. if you have extreme durability. a Metanon suit is just as tough as you are while you're wearing it. If you can turn invisible or shapeshift. a Metanon suit can do the same. if your powers require touch to activate their effects. you can activate these effects through Metanon Silk gloves. Lazer beams. plasma-transformations, intangibility. et cetera all work through Metanon Silk as if it were an extension of your skin. Moreover. it has just as much customization as regular cloth. and is only slightly heavier against your skin than normal clothing. That said. it doesn't provide much in the way of protection. given that it's dependent on your powers for durability beyond that of basic cloth. Moreover, Metanon Silk fibers can be readily added to almost any other material. since it allows anomalous effects to pass through it unimpeded.

objects.title: Xenogen Fiber (Resource)
objects.text: Xenogen, number 5 on the Anomalous Periodic Table, is an extremely valuable conductive metal, whose magnetic properties cause its electrons to spin both in anomalous and physical space. This, in practice, means that extremely pure Xenogen can produce anomalous effects, and someone who has powers or the potential for powers can control these effects the same way Supers control their powers normally, so long as they are in contact with the Xenogen in question. Purifying Xenogen to create high-level effects is nearly impossible without expensive and often fruitless metallurgic processing, and their effects are difficult if not impossible to predict or control. Your suit is an extremely lucky fit, to say the least. Using the "Aberrant Powers” section, purchase up to 6 points worth of powers, using normal points, which will be incorporated into the suit. Up to one third of the points you spend on the suit’s powers, rounded down, can be spent using R.P. instead of normal points. This is to balance the fact that they are the suit’s powers and not yours, though you and anyone else who has powers or the potential for powers can use them while in the suit. Yours is an exceptional suit, without question; even the most pure modern deposits of Xenogen can seldom produce effects higher than Magnitude 3, even with purification methods formulated by superhuman engineers. Xenogen is also widely used in modern power testing devices, but has difficulty discerning between individuals with the potential for powers and people who already have them. If you have any Symbiotic Patron, your symbiote may take the form of this suit, and you pay 0 R.P for it. If you wish to add powers to your suit and thus your symbiote, you may do so as usual through this option, with +2 R.P already paid for towards its cost.

objects.title: Xenogen Fiber (Power)
objects.text: Xenogen, number 5 on the Anomalous Periodic Table, is an extremely valuable conductive metal, whose magnetic properties cause its electrons to spin both in anomalous and physical space. This, in practice, means that extremely pure Xenogen can produce anomalous effects, and someone who has powers or the potential for powers can control these effects the same way Supers control their powers normally, so long as they are in contact with the Xenogen in question. Purifying Xenogen to create high-level effects is nearly impossible without expensive and often fruitless metallurgic processing, and their effects are difficult if not impossible to predict or control. Your suit is an extremely lucky fit, to say the least. Using the "Aberrant Powers” section, purchase up to 6 points worth of powers, using normal points, which will be incorporated into the suit. Up to one third of the points you spend on the suit’s powers, rounded down, can be spent using R.P. instead of normal points. This is to balance the fact that they are the suit’s powers and not yours, though you and anyone else who has powers or the potential for powers can use them while in the suit. Yours is an exceptional suit, without question; even the most pure modern deposits of Xenogen can seldom produce effects higher than Magnitude 3, even with purification methods formulated by superhuman engineers. Xenogen is also widely used in modern power testing devices, but has difficulty discerning between individuals with the potential for powers and people who already have them. If you have any Symbiotic Patron, your symbiote may take the form of this suit, and you pay 0 R.P for it. If you wish to add powers to your suit and thus your symbiote, you may do so as usual through this option, with +2 R.P already paid for towards its cost.

objects.title: Andromedite Admix
objects.text: Andromedite has the curious ability to return to any previous state it has existed in, including in relative location in response to a metawave signature it is metallurgically processed in proximity to. As such. you will need to be present for the refinement process. but  afterwards. this suit sports a host of possible uses. By flexing your powers, an Andromedite Admix suit can instantly activate on your body or dissipate into a storage location it has been before. repair any possible damages, and, of course, store feasibly infinite previous designs, which may be shifted between at the will of the user. As a complementary feature, your suit manufacturer can premake up to eight distinct designs of your choosing, which may be shifted between at will. This is practically useful for Supers who frequently change form, for Supers who may need to activate their suit instantaneously, or for Supers whose suits get regularly torn by high-impact professional hero or villain work. In more cosmetic terms, this suit is perfect for those who may want to change their suit regularly. or even mid-combat. While it does not possess the anti-entropic durability of substances like Entropium. it can be practically repaired as much as the user needs, so long as there is sufficient space to do so. making patchwork as simple as willing the suit to revert.

objects.title: Morphogenic Mirror
objects.text: Morphogen is a substance whose resonant frequency almost completely cancels the metawave of anomalies it is within sufficient proximity to. For semipure Morphogen. this usually entails direct contact. A suit made of this substance severely filters the powers of the user, and is mostly  used for training purposes. However. it has the interesting side-effect of weakening powers used against by the same amount it weakens your own abilities. making it extremely useful for those who don't have powers themselves. or those who are undergoing sadistic training regimens and are adapting to the dampening effects of Morphogen. While in all but the unpowered case. this effect doesn't do more than subtract equally from both of your relative strengths, thus not practically changing the playing field. if you don't have powers yourself. or would like to dampen your powers manually for training purposes or a challenge. this kind of suit may be exactly what you're looking for. Morphogen is also used to create containmentjackets for dangerous Supers while imprisoned. and the like.  Choose a percentage of your power which this suit will filter. if you have powers. That relative portion of your abilities will be subtracted from the effects of powers made against you. Note that even at 100% filtration of your powers, someone stronger than you would still have a portion of their power remaining. since you can only subtract from others what you can subtract from yourself. If you don't have any powers, you may increase this filtration to filter a maximum of 75% of metawaves against powers used on you across all possible powers. This effect only filters powers when they are used against or by you. and does not affect others or your surroundings.

objects.title: Entropium Alloy
objects.text: Entropium possesses a suite of thermodynamic properties that make it nearly indestructible when not under very specific electromagnetic conditions. Unless you happen to be conducting Specific alternating current frequencies across your suit. the effects of heat. cold. rust. acids.  erosion and deteriorating forces of any kind will leave this suit totally unaffected. it is hydrophobic. lipophobic. and airtight meaning it does not become wet and is nearly impossible to sully. It is infeasible to tear, cut, or otherwise damage it without truly absurd forces applied to it. and it absorbs shock to a degree unmatched by any mundane material. Moreover. it is nearly immune to the effects of time; if a suit that will last several hundred million years without so much as a patch job is in your shopping list. Entropium may be the ideal material for your costume. Its base temperature cannot be altered unless specific alternating currents are run across it. meaning that it is always out—of-the-dryer warm or spring rain cool in even the most extreme conditions. In its purest form. this metal is nearly impossible to thread or refine. so it is doped to allow for supersuits to be made with it.

objects.title: Neo-Hyperlattice
objects.text: In the glory days, Hyperlattice was the highest quality suit anyone could ask for. Anomalous material synthesis could only create a few grams of a given substance at a time. and a suitable substitute was required. While Mollonium itself is one of the most common anomalous elements on Earth, it is  not especially useful except when bound to noble gases like Neon and Krypton. In this state, it becomes an incredibly versatile material which can selectively replicate the properties, anomalous or chemical, of nearly any substance. Technology at the time meant that this material could never see its true potential. Nee-Hyperlattice is that true potential. taken to its utmost extreme.  Choose up to two materials for your suit to replicate in beneficial properties, such as Metanon. Xenogen, Andromedite, and so on. If you choose one. this suit costs 32 R.P. If you choose two, this suit costs 40 R.P. If you choose Xenogen, you must still pay for the powers involved as entailed in the Xenogen Fiber description. without the benefit of using R.P for points while designing powers.  If you desire. you may choose one technological suit type. which will be constructed using the Neo—Hyperlattice compound material you have chosen, preserving its anomalous properties and giving you all the technological benefits associated with it. If you choose to do so. add 8 R.P to the cost of this suit.

objects.title: Eccentricities
objects.text: Suits need more than pure utility: they need visuals. effects. sensuality, intimidation factor, and wicked stylization. Purchasing this option allows you to make any nonstandard design changes to your suit as you see fit. and include any nonanomalous materials or cosmetic effects you desire. Holographic and hard light  technology have come immensely far in recent decades, as have adhesives. memory-fabrics. aerogels. and more. Incorporate holofoil that looks as if it extends into deep space, ice yourself out with luxurious materials like gold plating or jewelry. create near impossible adhesive skin-fits that make eyes pop, or incorporate any variety of holographics. LEDs. or glow-in-the-dark designs. Essentially any cosmetic alteration you could possibly conceive of is at your disposal. and you can make alterations in record—time by contacting your suit manufacturer. This option allows you to make any changes to your suit not applicable to combat or utility that you see fit. within reason.

objects.title: Metanon Infusion
objects.text: Since the effects of Metanon Silk are so ubiquitously useful. and Metanon itself is a versatile material that doesn't substantively disrupt any anomalous properties of the main material itself, its effects can be cheaply infused into nearly any suit. While technological suits may have trouble  incorporating Metanon into enough components, it is a sufficiently versatile conductor and can replace copper wiring. steel or iron components. and so forth to meet these requirements. Purchasing this option once allows you to apply it to any and all suits you possess.

objects.title: Utilities
objects.text: Choose any basic technology that might be readily available in 2045. Each such utility you add to your suit comes at a cost of two Resource Points. These utilities can be enormous in variety. but cannot act as replacements for powers that non~superhuman engineered technology could feasibly replicate (for instance. you could use  technology available to modern militaries in the real world. et cetera). Communications systems. heads-up visors, wingsuit gliders. infrared/night vision scopes. kevlar under-vests, and much, much more are accessible through your suit provider. Each distinct utility you make costs 8 R.P. meaning that two functionally disconnected pieces of high- tech would need to be bought separately. If you are adding utilities to a Cybersuit. this cost is lowered to 4 R.P. This option may also be used to purchase utilities not directly attached to your suit. such as guns. gadgets. and so on.

objects.title: Supertech
objects.text: If modern technology is all too simple for your needs. you may need to hire the skilled hands of a supertech engineer. usually a Type Grey. with immense scientific knowledge and ingenuity. Need a nuclear battery to power antigravity propulsion systems? Buying two supertech gadgets can  easily make that a reality. Need a miniaturized wormhole in your arm- mounted missile launcher to continually resupply it? If it's possible for anyone, it's possible for a supertech engineer.
